00071         GLM_ALIGNED_STRUCT(16) fquatSIMD
00072         {
00073                 enum ctor{null};
00074                 typedef __m128 value_type;
00075                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00076                 static size_type value_size();
00077 
00078                 typedef fquatSIMD type;
00079                 typedef tquat<bool, defaultp> bool_type;
00080 
00081 #ifdef GLM_SIMD_ENABLE_XYZW_UNION
00082         union
00083         {
00084                     __m128 Data;
00085             struct {float x, y, z, w;};
00086         };
00087 #else
00088         __m128 Data;
00089 #endif
00090 
00092                 // Implicit basic constructors
00093

00097 
00099                 // Explicit basic constructors
00100

00102                         ctor);

00104                         float const & w, 
00105                         float const & x, 
00106                         float const & y,

00111                         vec3 const & eulerAngles);
00112                 
00113 
00115                 // Unary arithmetic operators

00118         fquatSIMD& operator*=(float const & s);
00119                 fquatSIMD& operator/=(float const & s);
00120         };
